GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object containing specified article

article.author: happyamy2016
article.title: 22 Amazing open source React projects
article.article_img_url: URL of image in the article..

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes of specified article

exampleResponse.title: 22 Amazing open source React projects
exampleResponse.author: happyamy2016
exampleResponse.article_img_url: URL of image in the article..

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for specified article sorted by most recent

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to the specified article
